usercount.title: User-Counting
usercount.description: May we update our user counter by your installation of the app for our statistics? We do not send respectively store any personal information about you.

911.title: In memory of the victims of September 11
911.description:
To honor those who died on September 11 we added some custom album covers for these songs: %s
And when you want, you can change all of the covers (only for today).
